text: Dinah Washington (born Ruth Lee Jones; August 24, 1924 - December 14, 1963) was an American R&B; and jazz singer. She was an African American who was born in Tuscaloosa, Alabama and raised in Chicago. She died of an accidental drug overdose in Detroit. ==Other websites== *http://digital.library.unt.edu/ark:/67531/metadc19767/m1/ Category:1924 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Accidental deaths in the United States Category:African-American musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:Drug-related accidental deaths Category:Singers from Alabama Category:Singers from Chicago Category:People from Tuscaloosa, Alabama
title: Dinah Washington
